_header: O eternal God of power infinite
_description: Robert Henryson, ‘Prayer for the Pest’ — eleven 8-line stanzas, sometimes followed by three-stanza epilogue

Banna.First Lines:
O eterne god of power infinytTo quhois hie knawlege na thing is
                        of obscure…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Thairfoir Evirmoir be gloir To thy godheidLat nocht be tynt
                    that thow sa deir hes bocht
Banna.Note:
Second occurrence in MS; eleven stanzas including 3-stanza
                    epilogue.
